Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
CAN: Draw two students on a page, likely without any clear connection between them (the basic idea of two participants is shown).
Draw random or unrelated lines that may suggest an incomplete or misunderstood attempt at connecting students (lines without purpose or proper connection).
CANNOT: Show how the string connects two cups to create a telephone (missing or inaccurate depiction of cups and string connection).
Illustrate any understanding of how sound travels through the string between cups (absent or incorrect depiction of sound travel; no arrows or waves).
Confidently use provided materials like cups and string in their drawing; might draw unrelated objects (confusion about what a string telephone entails).
Describe with labels how the string telephone works or aids communication (lacks labeling or uses incorrect labels, such as 'rope' instead of 'string').
Include details explaining how communication over long distances is beneficial (lack of context, may not understand the purpose of a string telephone).
